quote: Just living is not enough... one must have sunshine, freedom, and a little flower.
name: Hans Christian Andersen

quote: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
name: Jim Morrison

quote: We know what works. Freedom Works. We know what's right. Freedom is right.
name: George H. W. Bush

quote: The secret to happiness is freedom... And the secret to freedom is courage.
name: Thucydides

quote: Education is the key to unlock the golden door of freedom.
name: George Washington Carver

quote: Art, freedom and creativity will change society faster than politics.
name: Victor Pinchuk

quote: War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength.
name: George Orwell

quote: A hero is someone who understands the responsibility that comes with his freedom.
name: Bob Dylan

quote: Money won't create success, the freedom to make it will.
name: Nelson Mandela

quote: Freedom is the open window through which pours the sunlight of the human spirit and human dignity.
name: Herbert Hoover

quote: Freedom is never voluntarily given by the oppressor; it must be demanded by the oppressed.
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Freedom is nothing but a chance to be better.
name: Albert Camus

quote: If the freedom of speech is taken away then dumb and silent we may be led, like sheep to the slaughter.
name: George Washington

quote: I wish that every human life might be pure transparent freedom.
name: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: Freedom itself was attacked this morning by a faceless coward, and freedom will be defended.
name: George W. Bush

quote: Love does not claim possession, but gives freedom.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Liberty cannot be preserved without general knowledge among the people.
name: John Adams

quote: Conformity is the jailer of freedom and the enemy of growth.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: Freedom lies in being bold.
name: Robert Frost

quote: I've sold my soul for freedom. It's lonely but it's sweet.
name: Melissa Etheridge

quote: Liberty, when it begins to take root, is a plant of rapid growth.
name: George Washington

quote: It is difficult to free fools from the chains they revere.
name: Voltaire

quote: People demand freedom of speech as a compensation for the freedom of thought which they seldom use.
name: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: The patriot's blood is the seed of Freedom's tree.
name: Thomas Campbell

quote: Emancipate yourselves from mental slavery, none but ourselves can free our minds!
name: Marcus Garvey

quote: Humanity has won its battle. Liberty now has a country.
name: Marquis de Lafayette

quote: Freedom is hammered out on the anvil of discussion, dissent, and debate.
name: Hubert H. Humphrey

quote: If we don't believe in freedom of expression for people we despise, we don't believe in it at all.
name: Noam Chomsky

quote: When we lose the right to be different, we lose the privilege to be free.
name: Charles Evans Hughes

quote: I find only freedom in the realms of eccentricity.
name: David Bowie

quote: Enslave the liberty of but one human being and the liberties of the world are put in peril.
name: William Lloyd Garrison

quote: The First Amendment freedom of religion is as important today as when the Bill of Rights was first written.
name: Arlen Specter

quote: Man will never be free until the last king is strangled with the entrails of the last priest.
name: Denis Diderot

quote: Financial freedom is available to those who learn about it and work for it.
name: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Comfortable shoes and the freedom to leave are the two most important things in life.
name: Shel Silverstein

quote: No amount of political freedom will satisfy the hungry masses.
name: Vladimir Lenin

quote: So long as you do not achieve social liberty, whatever freedom is provided by the law is of no avail to you.
name: B. R. Ambedkar

quote: The boisterous sea of liberty is never without a wave.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: The secret of freedom lies in educating people, whereas the secret of tyranny is in keeping them ignorant.
name: Maximilien Robespierre

quote: The essence of mathematics lies in its freedom.
name: Georg Cantor

quote: Freedom consists not in doing what we like, but in having the right to do what we ought.
name: Pope John Paul II

quote: Emancipation from the bondage of the soil is no freedom for the tree.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Oppressed people cannot remain oppressed forever. The yearning for freedom eventually manifests itself.
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: If you're not ready to die for it, put the word 'freedom' out of your vocabulary.
name: Malcolm X

quote: Freedom of being alone is intoxicating.
name: Kangana Ranaut

quote: Let freedom reign. The sun never set on so glorious a human achievement.
name: Nelson Mandela

quote: Freedom is what you do with what's been done to you.
name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: I would like to be remembered as a person who wanted to be free... so other people would be also free.
name: Rosa Parks

quote: I think of a hero as someone who understands the degree of responsibility that comes with his freedom.
name: Bob Dylan

quote: Necessity is blind until it becomes conscious. Freedom is the consciousness of necessity.
name: Karl Marx

quote: A people cannot long retain their freedom, whose government is incapable of protecting them.
name: Oliver Ellsworth

quote: Man is free at the moment he wishes to be.
name: Voltaire

quote: History does not long entrust the care of freedom to the weak or the timid.
name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Forgiveness is the key to action and freedom.
name: Hannah Arendt

quote: The framers of our Constitution meant we were to have freedom of religion, not freedom from religion.
name: Billy Graham

quote: Mountains are freedom. Treat them respectfully.
name: Conrad Anker

quote: Man is not free unless government is limited.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: Struggle is a never ending process. Freedom is never really won, you earn it and win it in every generation.
name: Coretta Scott King

quote: I love the simplicity and freedom of running. A pair of shoes, and you are all set to explore new trails.
name: Rachel Boston

quote: You don't have to be a man to fight for freedom. All you have to do is to be an intelligent human being.
name: Malcolm X

quote: We are driven by five genetic needs: survival, love and belonging, power, freedom, and fun.
name: William Glasser

quote: I'll tell you what freedom is to me: no fear. I mean really, no fear!
name: Nina Simone

quote: I only ask to be free. The butterflies are free.
name: Charles Dickens

quote: Freedom of religion is a fundamental Constitutional principle. It's a founding principle of this country.
name: Paul Ryan

quote: Education is freedom.
name: Paulo Freire

quote: Freedom means you are unobstructed in living your life as you choose. Anything less is a form of slavery.
name: Wayne Dyer

quote: I have freedom. But freedom means total selfishness. It means nobody cares much what you do.
name: Lynn Barber

quote: We have freedom of speech, but you got to watch what you say.
name: Tracy Morgan

quote: I have a fantastic relationship with money. I use it to buy my freedom.
name: Gianni Versace

quote: The American flag is the symbol of our freedom, national pride and history.
name: Mike Fitzpatrick

quote: True independence and freedom can only exist in doing what's right.
name: Brigham Young

quote: If I fall, I'll fall five feet four inches forward in the fight for freedom. I'm not backing off.
name: Fannie Lou Hamer

quote: I took up arms for the freedom of my color. It is our own - we will defend it or perish.
name: Toussaint Louverture

quote: The price of freedom is eternal vigilance.
name: Desmond Tutu

quote: Freedom prospers when religion is vibrant and the rule of law under God is acknowledged.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: Yoga is a way to freedom. By its constant practice, we can free ourselves from fear, anguish and loneliness.
name: Indra Devi

quote: None are more hopelessly enslaved than those who falsely believe they are free.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Free people, remember this maxim: we may acquire liberty, but it is never recovered if it is once lost.
name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: Happiness is nothing but good health and freedom, and money is the single best way you can buy your freedom.
name: Scott Adams

quote: Freedom is something that dies unless it's used.
name: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: Those who expect to reap the blessings of freedom must, like men, undergo the fatigue of supporting it.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: No nation could preserve its freedom in the midst of continual warfare.
name: James Madison

quote: Freedom is the most contagious virus known to man.
name: Hubert H. Humphrey

quote: What is freedom of expression? Without the freedom to offend, it ceases to exist.
name: Salman Rushdie

quote: You can't separate peace from freedom because no one can be at peace unless he has his freedom.
name: Malcolm X

quote: What then is freedom? The power to live as one wishes.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Americans are so enamored of equality that they would rather be equal in slavery than unequal in freedom.
name: Alexis de Tocqueville

quote: I believe in absolute freedom of expression. Everyone has a right to offend and be offended.
name: Taslima Nasrin

quote: We gain freedom when we have paid the full price.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Anxiety is the dizziness of freedom.
name: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Freedom is just Chaos, with better lighting.
name: Alan Dean Foster

quote: While the State exists there can be no freedom; when there is freedom there will be no State.
name: Vladimir Lenin

quote: Freedom without rules doesn't work. And communities do not work unless they are regulated by etiquette.
name: Judith Martin

quote: You have freedom when you're easy in your harness.
name: Robert Frost

quote: Politicians love power. I love freedom. That is why I am not a politician.
name: Victor Pinchuk

quote: Singing provides a true sense of lightheartedness. If I sing when I am alone, I feel wonderful. It's freedom.
name: Andrea Bocelli

quote: None can love freedom heartily, but good men; the rest love not freedom, but licence.
name: John Milton

quote: Freedom is not an instantaneous holiday, as we once dreamed. It is a road. A long road. We know this now.
name: Svetlana Alexievich

quote: He only earns his freedom and his life Who takes them every day by storm.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: The right to religious freedom and the right to vote are both fundamental to our democracy.
name: Lois Frankel

quote: The greatest threat to freedom is the absence of criticism.
name: Wole Soyinka

quote: Freedom of the press is not an end in itself but a means to the end of achieving a free society.
name: Felix Frankfurter

quote: The work of art is a scream of freedom.
name: Christo

quote: Collectivism and freedom are mortal enemies. Only one will survive.
name: G. Edward Griffin

quote: Analysis gave me great freedom of emotions and fantastic confidence. I felt I had served my time as a puppet.
name: Hedy Lamarr

quote: The clash of ideas is the sound of freedom.
name: Lady Bird Johnson

quote: Whenever regulation increases, personal freedom decreases.
name: Alan Wilson

quote: Art is the daughter of freedom.
name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Freedom is the right to tell people what they do not want to hear.
name: George Orwell

quote: A big part of financial freedom is having your heart and mind free from worry about the what-ifs of life.
name: Suze Orman

quote: Freedom is not worth having if it does not connote freedom to err.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The best road to progress is freedom's road.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: The revelation of thought takes men out of servitude into freedom.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I think we must get rid of slavery, or we must get rid of freedom.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Freedom is the sure possession of those alone who have the courage to defend it.
name: Pericles

quote: The thing is this: You got to have fun while you're fightin' for freedom, 'cause you don't always win.
name: Molly Ivins

quote: Being offended by freedom of speech should never be regarded as a justification for violence.
name: Alan Dershowitz

quote: I am mortal. I want the nation to get used to freedom before I die.
name: Mustafa Kemal Ataturk

quote: You don't have true freedom until you allow a diversity of opinion and a diversity of voices.
name: Don Lemon

quote: Freedom means the opportunity to be what we never thought we would be.
name: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: Responsibility is the price of freedom.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: May we think of freedom, not as the right to do as we please, but as the opportunity to do what is right.
name: Peter Marshall

quote: Economic freedom cannot be sacrificed if political freedom is to be preserved.
name: Herbert Hoover

quote: I love music. It's freedom, a way to deal with pent-up frustration.
name: Ice Cube

quote: Freedom is the recognition of necessity.
name: Friedrich Engels

quote: True success, true happiness lies in freedom and fulfillment.
name: Dada Vaswani

quote: I have a free voice. I have a free mind. I have freedom of expression.
name: Larry Wilmore

quote: It is clear that not in one thing alone, but in many ways equality and freedom of speech are a good thing.
name: Herodotus

quote: Freedom is... not to be bound by my wounds. And to be able to eat cake every day.
name: Amanda de Cadenet

quote: One of the rewards of success is freedom, the ability to do whatever you like.
name: Sting

quote: Freedom across the world is a result of many individuals working together.
name: Dan Gable

quote: I believe we are on an irreversible trend toward more freedom and democracy - but that could change.
name: Dan Quayle

quote: Underlying most arguments against the free market is a lack of belief in freedom itself.
name: Milton Friedman

quote: Is freedom anything else than the right to live as we wish? Nothing else.
name: Epictetus

quote: Satisfaction consists in freedom from pain, which is the positive element of life.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: When you're not concerned with succeeding, you can work with complete freedom.
name: Larry David

quote: You can have peace. Or you can have freedom. Don't ever count on having both at once.
name: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: If we wish to free ourselves from enslavement, we must choose freedom and the responsibility this entails.
name: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Setting people to spy on one another is not the way to protect freedom.
name: Tommy Douglas

quote: Not caring more about what other people think than what you think. That's freedom.
name: Demi Moore

quote: It is easy to believe in freedom of speech for those with whom we agree.
name: Leo McKern

quote: Freedom is control in your own life.
name: Willie Nelson

quote: I think I have a right to live my life the way I like.
name: Malala Yousafzai

quote: My father always said, 'Malala will be free as a bird.'
name: Malala Yousafzai

quote: Freedom has never been free.
name: Medgar Evers

quote: If our freedom is taken, the American dream will wither and die.
name: Rand Paul

quote: To enjoy freedom we have to control ourselves.
name: Virginia Woolf

quote: Hate speech and freedom of speech are two different things.
name: Leslie Jones

quote: Bahrain 's margin of freedom is growing day after day as we head into the future with steady steps.
name: Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa

quote: Freedom is a muscle... you have to exercise it.
name: Roy Scheider

quote: America, to me, is freedom.
name: Willie Nelson

quote: Freedom in general may be defined as the absence of obstacles to the realization of desires.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: Now, one of the most essential branches of English liberty is the freedom of one's house.
name: James Otis

quote: Beauty of mind creates freedom. Freedom of mind creates beauty.
name: Ann Demeulemeester

quote: Without freedom of the press, there can be no representative government.
name: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand

quote: I suffered evils, but without allowing them to rob me of the freedom to expand.
name: Gordon Parks

quote: Every tyrant who has lived has believed in freedom for himself.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Freedom without limits is just a word.
name: Terry Pratchett

quote: I do not want art for a few any more than education for a few, or freedom for a few.
name: William Morris

quote: Men are freest when they are most unconscious of freedom. The shout is a rattling of chains, always was.
name: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Socialism and freedom are not compatible, regardless of repeated convincings.
name: Alija Izetbegovic

quote: The God of justice is with us, and our word, our work - our prayer for freedom will not, cannot be in vain.
name: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quote: I would describe and I have described myself to people who ask as a freedom fighter.
name: Steven Biko

quote: You can only protect your liberties in this world by protecting the other man's freedom.
name: Clarence Darrow

quote: Real freedom is having nothing. I was freer when I didn't have a cent.
name: Mike Tyson

quote: Whether in chains or in laurels, liberty knows nothing but victories.
name: Wendell Phillips

quote: To me, freedom entitles you to do something, not to not do something.
name: Shel Silverstein

quote: I absolutely value autonomy. I value freedom and having the ability to implement change right away.
name: Elizabeth Chambers

quote: The link between my experience as an entrepreneur and that of a politician is all in one word: freedom.
name: Silvio Berlusconi

quote: We hold our heads high, despite the price we have paid, because freedom is priceless.
name: Lech Walesa

quote: The American flag is the most recognized symbol of freedom and democracy in the world.
name: Virginia Foxx

quote: The United Nations is designed to make possible lasting freedom and independence for all its members.
name: Harry S Truman

quote: The desire of gold is not for gold. It is for the means of freedom and benefit.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Seek freedom and become captive of your desires. Seek discipline and find your liberty.
name: Frank Herbert

quote: Most men today cannot conceive of a freedom that does not involve somebody's slavery.
name: W. E. B. Du Bois

quote: Freedom is never dear at any price. It is the breath of life. What would a man not pay for living?
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: There is no such thing as part freedom.
name: Nelson Mandela

quote: The wisest use of American strength is to advance freedom.
name: George W. Bush

quote: I refuse to accept that the shackles of slavery can ever be stronger than the quest for freedom.
name: Kailash Satyarthi

quote: Order without liberty and liberty without order are equally destructive.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Violent means will give violent freedom. That would be a menace to the world and to India herself.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Exclusion is never the way forward on our shared paths to freedom and justice.
name: Desmond Tutu

quote: Grace is the beauty of form under the influence of freedom.
name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Freedom from effort in the present merely means that there has been effort stored up in the past.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Human dignity is based upon freedom, and freedom upon human dignity. The one presupposes the other.
name: Rollo May

quote: Liberty means responsibility. That is why most men dread it.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: If society fits you comfortably enough, you call it freedom.
name: Robert Frost

quote: Freedom has cost too much blood and agony to be relinquished at the cheap price of rhetoric.
name: Thomas Sowell

quote: The precondition to freedom is security.
name: Rand Beers

quote: The only certain freedom's in departure.
name: Robert Frost

quote: Never wear your best trousers when you go out to fight for freedom and truth.
name: Henrik Ibsen

quote: Without freedom, no art; art lives only on the restraints it imposes on itself, and dies of all others.
name: Albert Camus

quote: Freedom - to walk free and own no superior.
name: Walt Whitman

quote: When a truth is not given complete freedom, freedom is not complete.
name: Vaclav Havel

quote: 'Freedom from fear' could be said to sum up the whole philosophy of human rights.
name: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: The whole 'bad girl' thing allows me to mess up sometimes. And I have freedom to say more of what I want to.
name: Ronda Rousey

quote: I think my first album opened a lot of doors for me to push the freedom of speech to the limit.
name: Eminem

quote: Too much freedom can lead to the soul's decay.
name: Prince

quote: I hope for nothing. I fear nothing. I am free.
name: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: The history of the world is none other than the progress of the consciousness of freedom.
name: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quote: I chose America as my home because I value freedom and democracy, civil liberties and an open society.
name: George Soros

quote: We seek peace, knowing that peace is the climate of freedom.
name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Freedom means the right of people to assemble, organize, and debate openly.
name: Hillary Clinton

quote: Pleasure and freedom from pain, are the only things desirable as ends.
name: John Stuart Mill

quote: I have never been able to renounce the light, the pleasure of being, and the freedom in which I grew up.
name: Albert Camus

quote: The rainbow flag is a symbol of freedom and liberation that we made for ourselves.
name: Gilbert Baker

quote: Freedom from the desire for an answer is essential to the understanding of a problem.
name: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: Political Freedom without economic equality is a pretense, a fraud, a lie; and the workers want no lying.
name: Mikhail Bakunin

quote: We are living in an open world. There is a freedom of speech and, clearly, freedom of speculation.
name: Ehud Barak

quote: I want you to have this feeling too - it is my moral responsibility to help you achieve this inner freedom.
name: Dmitri Mendeleev

quote: The pillars of truth and the pillars of freedom - they are the pillars of society.
name: Henrik Ibsen

quote: The road to freedom must be uphill, even if it is arduous and frustrating.
name: Andrew Goodman

quote: When there is state there can be no freedom, but when there is freedom there will be no state.
name: Vladimir Lenin

quote: We must be willing to pay a price for freedom.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: I am not an Athenian or a Greek, but a citizen of the world.
name: Diogenes

quote: The freedom to criticize judges and other public officials is necessary to a vibrant democracy.
name: Sandra Day O'Connor

quote: Nothing that has value, real value, has no cost. Not freedom, not food, not shelter, not healthcare.
name: Dean Kamen

quote: Freedom is the freedom to say that two plus two make four. If that is granted, all else follows.
name: George Orwell

quote: Every time you pass a law, it is a little bite out of freedom.
name: Gary Johnson

quote: Only our individual faith in freedom can keep us free.
name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Freedom comes from strength and self-reliance.
name: Lisa Murkowski

quote: It is harder to preserve than to obtain liberty.
name: John C. Calhoun

quote: I know but one freedom, and that is the freedom of the mind.
name: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: We know the road to freedom has always been stalked by death.
name: Angela Davis

quote: Liberty must be limited in order to be possessed.
name: Edmund Burke

quote: Freedom is the right to live as we wish.
name: Epictetus

quote: Freedom is not procured by a full enjoyment of what is desired, but by controlling the desire.
name: Epictetus

quote: Freedom is the oxygen of the soul.
name: Moshe Dayan

quote: I believe that freedom of speech and freedom of religion go hand-in-hand in America.
name: Kirk Cameron

quote: What's real freedom? Real freedom is being able to not have my way and still be just as happy as if I did.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: The American dream is about freedom.
name: Nancy Pelosi

quote: One is a painter because one wants so-called freedom; one doesn't want to go to the office every morning.
name: Marcel Duchamp

quote: Freedom is a possession of inestimable value.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Freedom would be not to choose between black and white but to abjure such prescribed choices.
name: Theodor W. Adorno

quote: In America, through pressure of conformity, there is freedom of choice, but nothing to choose from.
name: Peter Ustinov

quote: People demand freedom only when they have no power.
name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: What is freedom? Freedom is the right to choose: the right to create for oneself the alternatives of choice.
name: Archibald MacLeish

quote: Protection of religious freedom means considering the faiths and beliefs of everyone involved.
name: Mike Quigley

quote: America's commitment to religious freedom and tolerance should not be conditional.
name: Mark McKinnon

quote: I am grateful for the sacrifices our veterans have made to defend our freedom and prosperity.
name: Bill Foster

quote: I believe in freedom of speech, but I believe we should also have the right to comment on freedom of speech.
name: Stockwell Day

quote: I fight, and have fought, for political freedom, for justice and for fairness and freedom of speech.
name: Teresa Heinz

quote: We know that our life of freedom is stronger than terror.
name: Angela Merkel

quote: Freedom of opinion can only exist when the government thinks itself secure.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: There can be no real freedom without the freedom to fail.
name: Erich Fromm

quote: Freedom is a man's natural power of doing what he pleases, so far as he is not prevented by force or law.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Freedom is a right ultimately defended by the sacrifice of America's servicemen and women.
name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: As soon as laws are necessary for men, they are no longer fit for freedom.
name: Pythagoras

quote: But I found that disappointing people is a good thing, because disapproval is freedom.
name: Demetri Martin

quote: If freedom makes social progress possible, so social progress strengthens and enlarges freedom.
name: Robert Kennedy

quote: Thought takes man out of servitude, into freedom.
name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Well, I'm a libertarian conservative, so I believe in limited government/maximum individual freedom.
name: John Bolton

quote: I'm disturbed by the words missing from the Trump campaign: Liberty, justice, freedom, and tolerance.
name: Ron Chernow

quote: The freedom of the press works in such a way that there is not much freedom from it.
name: Grace Kelly

quote: The American Dream is about freedom.
name: Rick Mears

quote: The only thing money gives you is the freedom of not worrying about money.
name: Johnny Carson

quote: Freedom is from within.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Real freedom lies in wildness, not civilization.
name: Charles Lindbergh

quote: Real freedom lies in wildness, not in civilization.
name: Charles Lindbergh

quote: Freedom is relative.
name: Billy Graham

quote: The greatest enemy of individual freedom is the individual himself.
name: Saul Alinsky

quote: The enemies of freedom do not argue; they shout and they shoot.
name: William Inge

quote: If they want to hang me, let them. And on the scaffold I will shout Freedom for the working class!
name: Mary Harris Jones

quote: America is a model of force and freedom and moderation - with all the coarseness and rudeness of its people.
name: Lord Byron

quote: Art requires neither complaisance nor politeness; nothing but faith, faith and freedom.
name: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Freedom is not enough.
name: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: Black Lives Matter is one iteration of a much larger struggle to fight for black people's freedom.
name: Patrisse Cullors

quote: Among the many values in life, I appreciate freedom most.
name: Haruki Murakami

quote: They ought to put an amendment to the First Amendment that says there shall also be freedom of hearing.
name: Tom Smothers

quote: Every dictator is an enemy of freedom, an opponent of law.
name: Demosthenes

quote: I am known for a life spent in the struggle for freedom, and freedom includes the freedom of religion.
name: Oriana Fallaci

quote: Secrecy is the freedom tyrants dream of.
name: Bill Moyers

quote: Victorious living does not mean freedom from temptation, nor does it mean freedom from mistakes.
name: E. Stanley Jones

quote: Five or six hundred heads cut off would have assured your repose, freedom and happiness.
name: Jean-Paul Marat

quote: Without peace, there is no freedom, individual or national. War and hostilities are a form of slavery.
name: Klas Pontus Arnoldson

quote: They call them terrorists, I call them freedom fighters.
name: Louis Farrakhan

quote: Liberation is not deliverance.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: Freedom can occur only through education.
name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: All theory is against freedom of the will; all experience for it.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: A filmmaker has almost the same freedom as a novelist has when he buys himself some paper.
name: Stanley Kubrick

quote: Hero-worship is strongest where there is least regard for human freedom.
name: Herbert Spencer

quote: Do not allow to slip away from you freedoms the people who came before you won with such hard knocks.
name: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Freedom is not of use to those who do not know how to employ it.
name: Sylvia Plath

quote: Freedom is never given; it is won.
name: A. Philip Randolph

quote: The right to be let alone is indeed the beginning of all freedoms.
name: William O. Douglas

quote: I enjoy the freedom of the blank page.
name: Irvine Welsh

quote: Freedom of the press is guaranteed only to those who own one.
name: A. J. Liebling

quote: Time misspent in youth is sometimes all the freedom one ever has.
name: Anita Brookner

quote: I believe firmly that in making ethical decisions, man has the prerogative of true freedom of choice.
name: Corliss Lamont

quote: I say there is not more happiness for me than the freedom of my Homeland.
name: Islom Karimov

quote: In the beginning, I loved being famous, but now I am tired of it and I would like to go back to my freedom.
name: Roberto Cavalli

quote: We will not fail your expectations of us as a new nation dedicated to peace, democracy, and freedom.
name: Shigeru Yoshida

quote: Money equals freedom.
name: Kevin O'Leary

quote: If one is going to err, one should err on the side of liberty and freedom.
name: Kofi Annan

quote: Many a time freedom has been rolled back - and always for the same sorry reason: fear.
name: Molly Ivins

quote: Fiction is such a world of freedom, it's wonderful. If you want someone to fly, they can fly.
name: Alice Walker

quote: I'm not sure if it's good to have freedom or not. I'm really confused now.
name: Jackie Chan

quote: 'Emergencies' have always been the pretext on which the safeguards of individual liberty have been eroded.
name: Friedrich August von Hayek

quote: Freedom is not just declared; it is exercised.
name: Ferdinand Marcos

quote: That feeling of freedom, open highways of possibilities, has kind of been lost to materialism and marketing.
name: Sheryl Crow

quote: Privacy is not explicitly spelled out in the Constitution as freedom of speech is in the First Amendment.
name: Larry Flynt

quote: I need this wild life, this freedom.
name: Zane Grey

quote: Liberty, freedom and democracy are very fuzzy words, but human rights is very specific.
name: Joichi Ito

quote: I need to feel like I have that freedom to make mistakes and to just try things.
name: Megan Rapinoe

quote: A hungry man is not a free man.
name: Adlai Stevenson I

quote: Freedom rings where opinions clash.
name: Adlai Stevenson I

quote: Thus the public use of reason and freedom is nothing but a dessert, a sumptuous dessert.
name: Johann Georg Hamann

quote: Without democracy there is no freedom. Violence, no matter who is using it, is always reactionary.
name: Friedrich Ebert

quote: Until you have lost your reputation, you never realize what a burden it was or what freedom really is.
name: Margaret Mitchell

quote: Freedom is contagious. That's why despots fear it so much.
name: Bill Owens

quote: The very idea of freedom incites fear in the hearts of terrorists across the world.
name: Elizabeth Dole

quote: I know the freedom that cycling gives you in terms of being able to just jump on and go.
name: Bradley Wiggins

quote: Wrong people are wrong because they use their freedom to deny it to others.
name: William A. Dembski

quote: I'm a big advocate of freedom: freedom of speech, freedom of expression, freedom of thought.
name: Jimmy Wales

quote: One of the things that fascinated me about modeling was that you had the freedom to look any way you wanted.
name: Veronica Webb

quote: I want to have the freedom to do whatever I want.
name: Paul Walker

quote: A man is either free or he is not. There cannot be any apprenticeship for freedom.
name: Amiri Baraka

quote: No man is good enough to be another's master.
name: William Morris

quote: Freedom is absolutely necessary for the progress in science and the liberal arts.
name: Baruch Spinoza

quote: For you who no longer posses it, freedom is everything, for us who do, it is merely an illusion.
name: Emil Cioran

quote: Liberty is not the power of doing what we like, but the right to do what we ought.
name: John Dalberg-Acton

quote: The more liberty you give away the more you will have.
name: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: The liberty of the individual is a necessary postulate of human progress.
name: Ernest Renan

quote: In a completely sane world, madness is the only freedom.
name: J. G. Ballard

quote: The freedom of every artist is essential.
name: Christo

quote: The information I requested under the Freedom of Information Act has been blocked for two years.
name: Sibel Edmonds

quote: Resist this war on God, freedom of religion and freedom of speech.
name: Ben Carson

quote: Liberty is worth paying for.
name: Jules Verne

quote: Freedom is for fun.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Freedom is man's capacity to take a hand in his own development. It is our capacity to mold ourselves.
name: Rollo May

quote: Freedom is the only law which genius knows.
name: James Russell Lowell

quote: You can only be free if I am free.
name: Clarence Darrow

quote: The more decisions that you are forced to make alone, the more you are aware of your freedom to choose.
name: Thornton Wilder

quote: Heresy is another word for freedom of thought.
name: Graham Greene

quote: You cannot parcel out freedom in pieces because freedom is all or nothing.
name: Tertullian

quote: There is no such thing as a little freedom. Either you are all free, or you are not free.
name: Walter Cronkite

quote: We do not commonly see in a tax a diminution of freedom, and yet it clearly is one.
name: Herbert Spencer

quote: Freedom granted only when it is known beforehand that its effects will be beneficial is not freedom.
name: Friedrich August von Hayek

quote: Liberty is not a means to a higher political end. It is itself the highest political end.
name: John Dalberg-Acton

quote: Freedom is always and exclusively freedom for the one who thinks differently.
name: Rosa Luxemburg

quote: Freedom is the right to one's dignity as a man.
name: Archibald MacLeish

quote: Our freedom can be measured by the number of things we can walk away from.
name: Vernon Howard

quote: Free speech carries with it some freedom to listen.
name: Warren E. Burger

quote: Free men are the strongest men.
name: Wendell Willkie

quote: Coercion, after all, merely captures man. Freedom captivates him.
name: Robert McNamara

quote: Freedom - an occupied space which must be reoccupied every day.
name: John Ralston Saul

quote: Human beings crave freedom at their core.
name: John Ensign

quote: We should favor innovation and freedom over regulation.
name: George Allen

quote: One of the unsung freedoms that go with a free press is the freedom not to read it.
name: Ferdinand Mount

quote: Freedom is never easily won, but once established, freedom lasts, spreads and chokes out tyranny.
name: Trent Lott
